title: 有没有办法替换自己走过的路为岩浆或者其他之类的东西
author: kuangsanlaopo
txt_content: 不是立刻替换自己脚下的方块的那种...离开了那块方块就会替换掉的那个

replies.author: 晴路卡
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 晴路卡 于 2020-4-21 13:55 编辑 

1.15.2为例
按顺序高频执行以下命令：
execute as @a at @s unless block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:air positioned ~-0.5 ~-1 ~-0.5 unless entity @e[type=minecraft:area_effect_cloud,tag=air,dx=0,dy=0,dz=0] run summon minecraft:area_effect_cloud ~0.5 ~ ~0.5 {Duration:9999999,Tags:["air"]}
execute as @e[tag=air] at @s positioned ~-0.5 ~1 ~-0.5 unless entity @a[dx=0,dy=0,dz=0] run setblock ~0.5 ~-1 ~0.5 lava destroy
execute as @e[tag=air] at @s positioned ~-0.5 ~1 ~-0.5 unless entity @a[dx=0,dy=0,dz=0] run kill @s
复制代码
